original_text: After they had gone, the two climbed out of the well and went to inform King David. They said to him, “Set out and cross the river at once; Ahithophel has advised such and such against you.”
korean_text: 그들이 간 후에 두 사람이 우물에서 올라와서 다윗 왕에게 가서 다윗 왕에게 말하여 이르되 당신들은 일어나 빨리 물을 건너가소서 아히도벨이 당신들을 해하려고 이러이러하게 계략을 세웠나이다

sentences.original_text: the two climbed out of the well
and went to inform King David
Set out and cross the river at once
Ahithophel has advised such and such against you
sentences.korean_translation: 아히도펠이 당신에게 이런 저런 조언을 했습니다
